WMRC 2009 Exhibition

Work is steadily progressing on planning for our 2009 exhibition. Our venue will once again be the Brandon Park Community Centre on Ferntree Gully Road, opposite Brandon Park Shopping Centre.

We have a number of new layouts planned for display next year, and some that have not been seen for some time.

Keep the Queen’s Birthday weekend (6th-8th June 2009) free, and we’ll see you there!

Tags: 2009, Exhibitions, WMRC
